attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is illegal to have sex in public so why not make smoking illegal in public? Having sex in public would offend far fewer people than smoking in public does. Adults smoking in the privacy of their own homes is one thing, smoking in public is another. Consider non-smokers Human Rights for once!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
